articles.title: IndiGo will ground as many planes as Air India Express + Akasa Air in Jan-Mar quarter | Mint - Mint
articles.description: IndiGo may have to ground planes to the number of around mid-thirties due to the powder metal issue on its Pratt & Whitney fleet, bringing the total grounded planes to over 80 in Q4-FY24.
